column5: Not sure if this has been posted yet or not - just saw it on another board and thought it was interesting for those who haven't seen it - these guys are nuts!!!     Tracker
4.5 hours on a kayak fishing a marlin in ocean... that's priceless!
That's incredible    Adrenaline to the MAX Thanks for sharing Tracker Leechman
What a rush.There is a show every week on WFN about Kayak fishing.Now there's a MANLY SPORT When they hook into a monster,you have to ask yourself who is catching who
